bpp/descriptor.name: Adya Seller Np ONDC
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Adya is a universal open-source platform for commerce and supply chain. With its Platform-as-a-Service and integration-Platform-as-a-service capabilities, Siva is a truly interoperable solution, with more than 100 ready-made solutions at the door.

descriptor.name: Gray T-shirt
descriptor.short_desc: omfortable and stylish, this 100% cotton t-shirt is perfect for everyday wear. Available in multiple colors and sizes, it features a classic crew neck and a relaxed fit.
descriptor.long_desc: pgrade your wardrobe with this versatile t-shirt made from premium 100% cotton, designed for comfort and durability. Featuring a classic crew neck, short sleeves, and a relaxed fit, this t-shirt is perfect for casual outings, lounging at home, or layering with your favorite jacket. It’s available in a variety of colors to suit your style, and comes in sizes ranging from XS to XXL. The breathable fabric ensures all-day comfort, making it a must-have staple in any wardrobe. Whether paired with jeans or shorts, this t-shirt offers timeless style and exceptional quality

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: 123 mira colony ship cart office Delhi
